OOC: Never mind Yan, I found it. Sorry if I upset anyone with my joke post.
I dont know what I was thinking.

BIC:
Megatron takes two cubes and sucks them dry. His body began to hum, as his
energy burners shift to life. For the first time in a long while Megatron
feels strong again. He clenches his fist tightly, a small aura of energy
surrounds it. "I can feel the power, finally," he exlcaims.  He then looks
up at Autofire, his eyes glow a deep red. "You my friend will be a welcomed
troop to the Decepticon ranks, you show merciless, and that is a respected
trait in the Decepticons."
